# mythicbeasts_vps_images (Data Source)

Returns available VPS operating system images. Use image names from this data source when creating `mythicbeasts_vps`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.11.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

data "mythicbeasts_vps_images" "all" {}

output "all_images" {
  value = data.mythicbeasts_vps_images.all
}
```

- `images` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--images))

### Nested Schema for `images`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
- `name` (String)
